content.name: STITCH_TAP_MSSQL_TEST_DATABASE_USER
content.description: The admin user that should be used to connect to the test database (for docker, this is SA)

content.name: STITCH_TAP_MSSQL_TEST_DATABASE_PASSWORD
content.description: The password for the user (if docker, the SA user will be configured with this password)

content.name: STITCH_TAP_MSSQL_TEST_DATABASE_PORT
content.description: The port for hosting the server. (Default 1433)
